abstract: NBCUniversal held events in Midtown Manhattan on Monday night and Tuesday morning to shine a spotlight on efforts aimed at viewers who are women or speak Spanish.
snippet: NBCUniversal held events in Midtown Manhattan on Monday night and Tuesday morning to shine a spotlight on efforts aimed at viewers who are women or speak Spanish.
lead_paragraph: Night and day, to borrow the words of Cole Porter, the NBCUniversal division of Comcast is wooing marketers and agencies as its broadcast networks, cable channels and online properties get ready for the 2011-12 “upfront” advertising sales season.
